channel.title: Heh server help
channel.description: OK, so i got i made all my changes, and i ran the compiler and did "runserver.bat" and chose to run the server and heres the message "Starting Earthscape PKZ Server on 0.0.0.0:43594" if the ip is 0.0.0.0, how can people connect to it? and do i need to make router rule if my port is already 43594?

item.title: Heh server help
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

yea…im looking on how to do it w/o himachi…

Read full topic

item.title: Heh server help
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Just use Hamachi, and the 0.0.0.0 is the address it shows you on Hamachi, and if you just use Ham, you don’t need to use your router to host your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Heh server help
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

“Starting Earthscape PKZ Server on 0.0.0.0:43594”
if the ip is 0.0.0.0, how can people connect to it? and do i need to make router rule if my port is already 43594?
